text: Hum sirf teri hi ibadat kertay hain aur sirf tujh hi say madad chahatay hain Shuroo Allah kay naam say jo bara meharban nehayat reham kerney wala hai 45.1. Haa-meem! 45.2. Yeh kitab Allah ghalib hikmat walay ki taraf say nazil ki hui hai 45.3. Aasmano aur zamin mein emaandaron kay liye yaqeenan boht si nishaniyan hain 45.4. Aur khud tumhari pedaeesh mein aur inn janwaron ki pedaeesh mein jinehn woh phelata hai yaqeen rakhney wali qom kay liye boht si nishaniyan hain
